channel.title: How do i edit prices on items?
channel.description: how do i edit prices on items? and how to move npcs around i can edit what they say but seem to be stuck with prices and npcs moving around

item.title: How do i edit prices on items?
item.dc:creator: @Bladex0x Bladex0x
item.description:
@Bladex0x wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:2, topic:277602”]Prices is in the ItemsDef.xml and the Items.rscd. Search for baseprice.

The Items.rscd file needs to be exactly the same as the ItemsDef.xml.

Moving NPCs to different locations is in the NpcLoc.xml file ;)[/quote]Sometimes the npcs will get fucked so make sure u put in correct coords

Read full topic
item.source: How do i edit prices on items?

item.title: How do i edit prices on items?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Prices is in the ItemsDef.xml and the Items.rscd. Search for baseprice.

The Items.rscd file needs to be exactly the same as the ItemsDef.xml.

Moving NPCs to different locations is in the NpcLoc.xml file
